sources.title: Autumn Marathon | TRAGIC COMEDY
sources.description:
Buzykin, a bright-minded professor and translator, has an indecisive personality. In his personal life, he is torn between his wife Nina and his young mistress Alla. At work, mediocre coursemate Varvara shamelessly exploits Buzykin’s talents and also interferes in his private life. He even jogs in the morning against his will at the insistence of his guest, a Danish Professor Hanson, specializing in Slavic studies.

Year of production: 1979

Directed by: Georgiy Daneliya
Written by: Aleksandr Volodin
Director of photography: Sergei Vronsky
Music: Andrey Petrov
Production designers: Levan Shengelia, Eleonora Nemechek
Starring: Oleg Basilashvili, Norbert Kuchinke, Evgeni Leonov, Natalya Gundareva, Marina Neyolova, Galina Volchek

The film was digitally restored by Mosfilm Cinema Concern
Find out more: https://cg.mosfilm.ru/en
Subscribe to our YouTube channel, and be sure to click the bell so that you won’t miss the best Soviet movies!
